alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:58AM CDT until June 14 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LYON...NORTHWESTERN SIOUX...NORTHERN CLAY... LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN YANKTON...TURNER...NORTHWESTERN UNION AND EAST CENTRAL HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Centerville, or 8 miles west of Beresford, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hurley, Davis, Lennox, Worthing, Chancellor, Newton Hills State Park and Canton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
